Title: 09 - Collaboration with Other Clients
Tip: Create a milestone that tests your success. This is mine!

Summary.What: The best collaboration demo is two different users pulling on two blocks and the arrow stretches.
Summary.Why: 1D shapes must adjust there soze and orientation to stay connected in the diagram.
Summary.How: The function is executed as part of the source shapes render cycle.

Samples.Tip: Reminder, this is the way it will happen in the real world.  You will be listening to events and responding to them.
Samples.Title: Collaboration Flow
